subject: Sexual Health
title: When Does Puberty Start
description: Learn When Does Puberty Start in one minute.

hook.text: Girls typically start puberty between ages 8 and 13. Boys begin between 9 and 14.

buildup.text: The first sign in girls is usually breast budding. In boys, it is testicular enlargement.

discovery.text: Starting earlier or later than average is usually normal, but extremes may warrant medical evaluation.

twist.text: Globally, puberty onset has been getting earlier for over a century, especially for girls in developed nations.

climax.text: Knowing normal timing helps families recognize when development is typical and when to consult a doctor.

punchline.text: Normal ranges are wide. Early or late is often fine.
